experiment_name: Catalytic promiscuity enabled by photoredox catalysis in nicotinamide-dependent oxidoreductases
additional_information: reaction_condition: reaction_temperature:25 °C;    reaction_ph:8.0;    reaction_other_conditions:1.0 mol% DBR enzyme (NtDBR, PaDBR1, PaDBR2, AtDBR), 0.5 mol% Rose Bengal (photocatalyst), 1.0 mol% NADP+, 0.6 mg GDH-105, 82.5 μmol glucose (for NADPH regeneration), 530 nm LEDs (green irradiation), 12 hours, anaerobic atmosphere (under nitrogen), co-solvents: THF and EtOH (from substrate stock solution);    reaction_substrate_concentration:24 mM
